plain: Based on the user's favorite books, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is probably fiction, their favorite kind of plot is complex and multi-layered, their favorite setting is probably a historical or fictional one, their favorite writing style is probably literary and descriptive, their favorite length is probably a novel, their favorite topic is probably mythology or fantasy, their favorite pacing is probably slow and contemplative, their favorite narrative structure is probably third-person omniscient, and their favorite themes are probably identity, love, and loss.
